column5: I updated my profile pic and it shows up when I view my profile but it does not display in any messages that I post ??? Any ideas how to correct? I am sure it is something simple that I have overlooked.  Many Thanks Ted
Go to "my controls" at the top of the page and make sure you have the picture under your avatar rather than under your personal photos... Just a thought!  Hope it helps  cheers and Good Morning Jen
